name: Mom's Out (JourdainFrancois)
description:
This little game was made by 5 studient in second year of Game Design during the course of a week. 

It's really easy to play.

You can use a single keyboard to play or two controllers.

Left player :

ZQSD to move. A to hit with the left flip and E to hit with the right one.

Right player :

OKLM to move. I to hit with the left flip and P to hit with the right one.

With controller :

Move with the joystick, LB to hit with the left flip. RB to hit with the right one
